coded_answer.p: ThanksThank you very much for your recent letter. I can notcannot believe that I won the first prize (It'sit's great!) and, of course, I am very happy.
As for your questions, I am free to travel only onin July because I will havinghave my holiday after finishedfinishing the exams. And, I have to returnedreturn to my university by August.
I prefer to stay in a log cabin rather than in a tent because I am not used to with narrow spacespaces and feel more comfortable with a place like a bedroom.
Furthermore, I prefer to do painting and photography as my hobbies and my fasinativefascination infor art and enjoyedenjoy to taketaking a photographphotographs of wildlife.

Finally, please could you give me an idea what sort of clothes to bring? andAnd how much wouldwill be I spend there.? Also, please adviceadvise me forregarding any necessary thingsthings it is necessary to prepare and bring.
I lookinglook forward to hearing from you soon.
Sorry for I haven't written to you for such a long time, but I've got a good excuteexcuse!
Last month, I was partly in the concert teams. It was a big one that I never thougththought and I couldn't imaginehave imagined how amazing was itit was.

I didn't know what iswas my responsibleresponsibility until they called me to be trained.
